nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions

Interface InvoiceServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InvoiceService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvoiceServiceImpl

    public interface InvoiceServiceLocal
extends InvoiceService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int alertExpiredSystemInvoices(java.util.Calendar time)
      Process expired invoices, generating a member alert for system to member invoices that expires today, according to the AlertSettings.idleInvoiceExpiration
      void expireScheduledInvoices(java.util.Calendar time)
      Expires all scheduled invoices which haven't been accepted and expired before today
      TransactionSummaryVO getSummary(InvoiceSummaryDTO dto)
      Returns a summary for the invoices
      TransactionSummaryVO getSummaryByType(Currency currency, InvoiceSummaryType invoiceSummaryType)
      Returns a summary for the invoices of a given type
      Invoice loadByPayment(Payment payment, Relationship... fetch)
      Loads an invoice using an associated payment
      Invoice sendAutomatically(Invoice invoice)
      Sends an invoice, without testing the logged member.

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions.InvoiceService

        accept, canAccept, canCancel, cancel, canDeny, deny, getPossibleTransferTypes, load, search, send, validate, validateForAccept

    • Method Detail

      • alertExpiredSystemInvoices

        int alertExpiredSystemInvoices(java.util.Calendar time)
        Process expired invoices, generating a member alert for system to member invoices that expires today, according to the AlertSettings.idleInvoiceExpiration
        Returns:
        The number of expired invoices

      • expireScheduledInvoices

        void expireScheduledInvoices(java.util.Calendar time)
        Expires all scheduled invoices which haven't been accepted and expired before today

      • getSummary

        TransactionSummaryVO getSummary(InvoiceSummaryDTO dto)
        Returns a summary for the invoices

      • getSummaryByType

        TransactionSummaryVO getSummaryByType(Currency currency,
                                    InvoiceSummaryType invoiceSummaryType)
        Returns a summary for the invoices of a given type

      • loadByPayment

        Invoice loadByPayment(Payment payment,
                    Relationship... fetch)
                      throws EntityNotFoundException
        Loads an invoice using an associated payment
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - There's no invoice associated with the given payment

      • sendAutomatically

        Invoice sendAutomatically(Invoice invoice)
                          throws UnexpectedEntityException
        Sends an invoice, without testing the logged member. Should be called from internal procedures that send invoice (like account fees)
        Throws:
        UnexpectedEntityException
